# isInFullScreenMode

**Instance Property**

The property that indicates whether the panel is in full screen mode.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isInFullScreenMode: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the panel is currently open and in full screen mode; otherwise it’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Managing Full Screen Mode

- **enterFullScreenMode(_:withOptions:)**: Instructs the panel to enter full screen mode.
- **exitFullScreenMode(options:)**: Instructs the panel to exit full screen mode.
